name: Solar System Model (froggyoverlord)
description:
This is my solar system project for Michigan State University's online game design course. It is a simple model of Mercury, Venus, Earth, and Mars revolving around the Sun with comets firing away like the world is ending. I had a lot of fun making it and hopefully I'll upload a version with all of the planets and everything to scale for fun. Thank you for viewing this!

To the sparkles of the stars,

FroggyOverlord
